title: Glommer's Flower
summaries: Glommer's Flower is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that summons a Glommer pet that follows the player around. Glommer's Flower is dropped from Derplings with a 1/100 (1%) chance and increased to 1/40 (2.5%) in The Constant secret seed.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Glommer
'The petals shimmer in the light'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
